name: Arthur's Birthday
description:
Explore and share Marc Brown’s classic "Arthur’s Birthday", adapted from the original storybook into an interactive animated adventure! Arthur and his friends bring the story alive one word at a time, offering an easy to digest reading mode which is fully animated and voiced. Increase the challenge and the fun with an interactive at-your-own-pace option with lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

Arthur’s Birthday centers around everyone’s favorite Aardvark: Arthur. Arthur is very excitedly preparing for his birthday party. He has invited all his friends! However, Arthur is shocked to learn that Muffy also happens to share the same birthday as him. She even has planned a party for the same day! What a disaster! Which of the parties will their friends attend? Can Arthur figure out a solution to this dilemma that works for everyone?

Since it's first release in 1994, Living Books' rendition of "Arthur’s Birthday" has been enjoyed by countless children. Step-by-step, the reader will find the story is full of surprising encounters with many of their favorite Arthur storybook characters, providing new ways to interact with the book again and again.

  • Both interactive and story modes suitable for different levels of skill.
  • Interact with the pictures and discover hidden scenes.
  • Attractive animations bring the characters to life.
  • Fully voiced as you read! Chock full of memorable scenes!
  • A revitalized re-release compatible with modern platforms.
